title: someone steal my ac%%%%
body:
pls help me i want my account back 

answer me to this email : --snip--

replies.body: I removed your email for security reasons.  Reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), and our account team will be happy to help you out directly with this.  Hang tight!
